title: NeuroChip X1 Development
description: Design and implementation of a scalable neuromorphic processor capable of simulating 1 million spiking neurons for real-time pattern recognition and low-power AI workloads.
shortDescription: A neuromorphic processor project focusing on energy-efficient brain-inspired computing.
objectives: Develop a scalable neuromorphic hardware architecture.

deliverables.title: Processor Design Specification
deliverables.description: Detailed documentation of hardware architecture and neuron model implementation.

deliverables.title: Prototype FPGA Implementation
deliverables.description: Functional prototype running basic SNN models.

milestones.title: Architecture Design Completion
milestones.description: Core neuron and synapse modules finalized.

milestones.title: FPGA Prototype Testing
milestones.description: Run initial neural simulations on FPGA.

publications.title: Energy-Efficient Neuromorphic Processors for Edge AI

title: Brain-Inspired Vision System
description: Development of a spiking neural vision model for real-time object tracking and motion detection.
shortDescription: A biologically inspired visual processing system for robotic perception.
objectives: Integrate motion prediction for robotic applications.

deliverables.title: Simulation Model
deliverables.description: Functional model in PyTorch using SNN simulation tools.

milestones.title: Data Collection Phase
milestones.description: Collect motion datasets using robot camera systems.

title: Low-Power Neural Interface Board
description: A hardware interface board designed for connecting analog neuron sensors with FPGA-based neuromorphic systems.
shortDescription: Hardware board for bridging biological and digital neuron signal processing.

deliverables.title: Prototype Board
deliverables.description: Functional prototype tested with neuron sensors.

title: Collaborative AI Framework
description: Developing a modular AI framework enabling multi-agent learning and knowledge sharing between different neuromorphic systems.
shortDescription: Framework for collaborative AI using distributed learning agents.

title: Edge AI Accelerator
description: Research and design of a lightweight AI accelerator for low-power devices optimized for neuromorphic workloads.
shortDescription: Custom accelerator for on-device neuromorphic AI processing.

publications.title: Edge AI Acceleration for Neuromorphic Systems
